comments:
We found a bunch of error log files under <rad_install>/eclipse/configuration 
folder when install ifix002 for RAD60. These error are from eclipse runtime. 
But the installing of ifix002 could finish successfully and the 
features/plugins are copied over to the right place. The following is an 
example of the log files. Others are about BundleException, 
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,IOException etc.

Have you seen similar things happening on 3.1?

The implementation of the registry changed dramatically since 3.0.
Please re-open if you have more detailed steps on how to reproduce.
